app.long-description: This app is intended for people with PKU. It combines a calculator, pencil, paper and nutritional table.
app.auth-error: Unfortunately this did not work. Try it again. Always use the same login method.
app.limit: Entries limit reached. Support with a subscription for unlimited entries. See settings for more.

common.export-description: Your data will be exported as a CSV file.

home.title: Home
home.description: Nutrition app for low-phenylalanine diets. This app is intended for people with PKU. It combines a calculator, pencil, paper and nutritional table.
home.signin-desc: Easily sign in on any device. Data syncs in real time.
home.install-desc: Can be installed on any device (Android, iOS, Mac, Windows).
home.about-description: From the developer of one of the first PKU apps for Android "Phe Rechner", as well as "PKU Manager". Development of PKU apps since 2013.

food-search.title: Food Search
food-search.search-info: Refine your search with several words, e.g. "apples raw" or "potatoes cooked". Use the Barcode Scanner for products. Source: fdc.nal.usda.gov

phe-calculator.title: Phe Calculator
phe-calculator.description: Calculate the amount of Phe for a specific weight or convert protein to Phe.
phe-calculator.estimate-error: Failed to estimate food values. Please try again.
phe-calculator.estimate-error-quota: Service temporarily unavailable due to high demand. Please try again tomorrow.
phe-calculator.estimate-error-no-name: Please enter a food name first
phe-calculator.estimate-error-firebase: Service not available. Please refresh the page and try again.
phe-calculator.estimate-error-daily-limit: Daily limit of {limit} estimates reached. Please try again tomorrow.
phe-calculator.estimate-info: Estimated values can be inaccurate or wrong. Limited to {limit} per day. More with Premium.
phe-calculator.estimate-info-premium: Estimated values can be inaccurate or wrong. Limited to {limit} per day. More with Premium + AI.
phe-calculator.estimate-info-premium-ai: Estimated values can be inaccurate or wrong. Limited to {limit} per day.
phe-calculator.use-pro-model: Use best AI model (uses up more AI budget)
phe-calculator.use-pro-model-info: With this option, each estimate uses more of your daily budget.

barcode-scanner.title: Barcode Scanner
barcode-scanner.info: Phe gets calculated from protein. Source: openfoodfacts.org
barcode-scanner.error: Something went wrong. If the error occurs again, try restarting the app.
barcode-scanner.error-camera-permission: Camera access denied. Check the camera permission for your browser (Web) or the "Site Settings" by long pressing the app icon (Android).
barcode-scanner.error-no-camera: No camera found on this device.
barcode-scanner.error-not-supported: Camera not supported. A secure connection (HTTPS or localhost) is required.
barcode-scanner.error-not-readable: Camera cannot be used. Is it already active in another app?
barcode-scanner.error-overconstrained: No suitable camera found. Check your camera settings.
barcode-scanner.error-stream-api: Stream API is not supported in this browser.
barcode-scanner.error-insecure-context: Camera access is only permitted in a secure context. Use HTTPS or localhost.

own-food.title: Own Food
own-food.description: Save your own foods for quick addition.
own-food.delete-shared-warning: This food is shared with the community. Deleting it will also remove it for all community users. Consider keeping this food instead - shared foods don't count towards your storage limit, and keeping it allows the community to continue benefiting from your contribution.
own-food.unshare-warning: This will remove the food from the community database. All likes, dislikes, and usage statistics will be permanently lost.
own-food.reset-votes-warning: Changing the phenylalanine or calorie values will reset all community votes for this food. Users who previously voted will need to vote again.

diary.title: Diary
diary.description: Keep track of your food and monitor your Phe tolerance.

empty-state.message-1: Ready to start tracking? Add your first food entry!
empty-state.message-2: Your diary is waiting. Log your meals to stay on track.
empty-state.message-3: Time to log your first meal. Every entry helps you stay in control.
empty-state.message-4: Let's begin tracking. Add your first food item!
empty-state.message-5: Your diary is empty today. Start logging your meals!
empty-state.message-6: Ready to track? Add your first meal and keep your Phe in check.

diet-report.title: Diet Report
diet-report.description: Keep track of your food and monitor your Phe tolerance.
diet-report.export-food-description: Your food data will be exported as a CSV file.
diet-report.export-days-description: Your daily Phe totals will be exported as a CSV file.
diet-report.chart-info: The chart gets displayed after the second entry.

blood-values.title: Blood Values
blood-values.description: Track blood values in a diagram.
blood-values.chart-info: The chart gets displayed after the second entry.
blood-values.unit-info: Unit can be changed in the settings.

settings.title: Settings
settings.change-username-info: Update your display name that appears throughout the app.
settings.change-password-info: Please use the "Forgot Password" function under "Sign in with Email".
settings.reset-diary-description: Are you sure you want to delete all diary entries? This action cannot be undone.
settings.reset-blood-values-description: Are you sure you want to delete all blood values? This action cannot be undone.
settings.reset-own-food-description: Are you sure you want to delete all custom foods? This action cannot be undone. Note: Foods shared with the community will be kept and remain editable.
settings.delete-account-description: Are you sure you want to delete your account? All of your data will be permanently removed. This action cannot be undone. Note: Foods you shared with the community will remain available to help others, but can no longer be edited by you.
settings.delete-account-info: Only works if the last login was not too long ago. Please log out once and log in again.
settings.delete-account-error: Unfortunately this did not work. Try logging out and back in again.
settings.tier-unlimited-desc: Support monthly and get access to all features.
settings.tier-premium-ai-desc: Support monthly and get all features including AI.

sign-in.title: Sign in
sign-in.name: Name
sign-in.reset-note: Receive an email to reset the password.
sign-in.password-sent: Email for password reset has been sent. Please check your emails.

help.title: Help
help.install-p1: This web app can be installed on any device like an app.
help.install-p3: In Safari, tap the share button and then "Add to Home Screen".
help.install-p4: Click the little installation icon in the address bar in Chrome, Brave or Edge.

imprint.title: Imprint
imprint.open-source: This application is open source and available on

features.calculator-description: Calculate the amount of Phe for a specific weight or convert protein to Phe.
features.estimation-description: Estimate Phe and calorie values with AI when no values are available.
features.own-food-description: Save your own foods for quick addition.
features.diary-description: Keep track of your food and monitor your Phe tolerance.
features.blood-values-description: Track blood values in a diagram.
features.suggestions-description: Add suggestions to the diary with one click.
features.insights-description: View insights and trends about your nutrition.
features.community-food-description: Share and discover foods from the PKU community.

insights.title: Insights
insights.description: View insights and trends about your nutrition.
insights.satiety-tip-high: Your Phe intake ({phePercentage}%) is higher than your calorie intake ({kcalPercentage}%).
insights.satiety-tip-low: Your Phe intake ({phePercentage}%) is lower than your calorie intake ({kcalPercentage}%).
insights.satiety-tip-text: Your Phe intake is {phePercentage}% and your calorie intake is {kcalPercentage}%.
insights.previous-day-text: Yesterday's Phe intake was {phe} mg ({percentage}% of your daily limit).
insights.streak: You've tracked your nutrition for {streak} days in a row.
insights.streak-max: Current streak: {streak} days. Best streak: {maxStreak} days.
insights.streak-max-same: You've tracked your nutrition for {streak} days in a row.
insights.week: You've tracked for 7 or more consecutive days.
insights.start-tracking: You can track your nutrition daily to view your statistics.
insights.phe-stats-average: In the last 14 days (excluding today), your average Phe intake was {average} mg.
insights.phe-stats-deviation: The average deviation from your daily limit is {deviation}%.

cookie-consent.message: We use cookies for essential functions and to improve the app. Accept cookies?

health-consent.title: Health Data Processing Consent
health-consent.subtitle: This app stores health data. Please consent to data processing to use the app.
health-consent.data-summary: Nutrition diary, blood values, custom foods, and personal settings (Phe tolerance, calorie needs).
health-consent.privacy-summary: Your data is stored securely and not shared with third parties. You can delete your data at any time.
health-consent.consent-text: I consent to the storage and processing of my health data and have read the privacy policy.
health-consent.email-consent-text: I want to receive emails about app updates and important news (optional).
health-consent.error-saving: Error saving consent. Please try again.
health-consent.no-consent: You must consent to health data storage to use this feature. Please go to settings.
health-consent.consent-given: Consent for health data storage has been given.
health-consent.consent-revoked: Consent for health data storage has been revoked.
health-consent.revoke-confirm: Do you really want to revoke consent for health data storage? This will prevent the use of most app features.
health-consent.error-revoking: Error revoking consent. Please try again.
health-consent.no-consent-status: No consent for health data storage given
health-consent.no-consent-explanation: Without consent, you cannot store health data or use most app features.
health-consent.email-consent-subtitle: Receive emails about app updates and important news.
health-consent.error-updating-email: Error updating email consent. Please try again.

getting-started.title: Getting Started
getting-started.subtitle: Welcome to PKU Tools! Here you can set up the app and consent to data processing.

community.duplicateError: A similar food already exists in the community
